Detailed Description

Model for the series combo box on the main screen.

Author:
mep

Object ScheatorModel.ScheatorComboBoxModel.getElementAt ( int  index  )  [inherited]

Returns item in collection at certain location

Note:
This is a horribly slow implementation, but it seems LinkedHashMap does not allow finding a specific index point with direct indexing.
Parameters:
index 
Returns:
Series.SeriesData located in the specific index, or null if index not found.
